author: Katrina Bishop
title: Britain's heir to the throne Prince Charles tests positive for coronavirus, has mild symptoms
description: Britain's heir to the throne, Prince Charles, has tested positive for the coronavirus, according to a statement from his London household.
content:
Britain's heir to the throne, Prince Charles, has tested positive for the coronavirus, according to a statement from his London household.
